description: The project offers the opportunity for the student to develop research capabilities. It promotes creative thinking and allows independent work on a prescribed research project. Students undertake the project over two semesters. Each student is expected to spend not less than 9 hours per week on the project chosen from a wide range of topics in environmental engineering field.
